dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Here is a summary of your activities.

customers.title: Clients
customers.description: Manage your client roster and their history.

add.title: Add New Client
add.description: Enter the details for the new client.
add.success_toast_desc: The new client has been successfully added to your roster.
add.error_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.

reading.title: New Tarot Reading
reading.description: Start a new reading session for a client.
reading.spreadDescription: The cards representing past, present, and future.
reading.loadingMessage: The spirits are whispering... generating your interpretation.

toast.missingInfoDesc: Please select a client and draw cards first.
toast.failedDesc: The connection to the ethereal plane was lost. Please try again.

services.title: Services
services.pageDescription: A catalog of the mystical services you offer.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.description: View and manage your public profile.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure your services, availability, and payment methods.

specializations.title: Manage Your Specializations
specializations.description: Add, edit, or remove the types of readings you offer.

durations.title: Session Durations & Pricing
durations.description: Define the length and cost for your various services.

payment.title: Payment Gateways
payment.description: Connect your preferred methods for receiving payments.
